org.thethingsnetwork.management.sync

Class Handler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.thethingsnetwork.management.sync.Handler

  • public class Handler
extends Object
    This class is a wrapper for the The Things Network handler service
    Author:
    Romain Cambier

                           String _host,

        Build a Handler wrapper instance
        Parameters:
        _credentials - A valid authentication token
        _host - The handler host
        _port - The handler port
        _certificate - The handler certificate

        The newly built Handler
